titles.title: Aime Zyla Act of 2005
To amend the Jacob Wetterling Crimes Against Children and Sexually Violent Offender Registration Act to extend registration requirements to juvenile sex offenders.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 6/8/2005--Introduced. Aime Zyla Act of 2005 - Amends the Jacob Wetterling Crimes Against Children and Sexually Violent Offender Registration Act to extend registration requirements to any person adjudicated a juvenile delinquent for conduct that would be an offense requiring registration if committed by an adult.
